009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.AlgebraicEllipse;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFit5Points;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitAlgebraic;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable;
017
018/**
019 * RANSAC detector for ellipses.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 * 
023 * @see GeometricEllipse
024 * @see RansacCurveDetector
025 */
026public class RansacDetectorEllipse extends RansacCurveDetector<GeometricEllipse> {
027        
028        /**
029         * Nested class extending {@link RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters} 
030         * to specify additional RANSAC parameters.
031         */
032        public static class Parameters extends RansacCurveDetector.RansacParameters {
033                
034                /**
035                 * Constructor used to define default parameter values.
036                 */
037                public Parameters() {
038                        this.maxIterations = 1000;
039                        this.maxInlierDistance = 2.0;
040                        this.minInlierCount = 100;
041                }
042        }
043        
044        // constructors ------------------------------------
045        
046        /**
047         * Constructor using specific parameters.
048         * @param params RANSAC parameters
049         */
050        public RansacDetectorEllipse(Parameters params) {
051                super(5, params);
052        }
053        
054        /**
055         * Constructor using default parameters.
056         */
057        public RansacDetectorEllipse() {
058                this(new Parameters());
059        }
060        
061        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
062
063        @Override
064        protected GeometricEllipse fitInitial(Pnt2d[] points) {
065                EllipseFitAlgebraic fit = new EllipseFit5Points(points);
066                AlgebraicEllipse ellipse = fit.getEllipse();
067                return (ellipse == null) ?  null : new GeometricEllipse(ellipse);
068        }
069        
070        @Override
071        protected GeometricEllipse fitFinal(Pnt2d[] inliers) {
072                EllipseFitAlgebraic fit2 = new EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable(inliers);
073                AlgebraicEllipse ellipse = fit2.getEllipse();
074                return (ellipse == null) ?  null : new GeometricEllipse(ellipse);
075        }
076
077}
